text: The Sorrows of Young Werther (German: Die Leiden des jungen Werthers )is one of the most famous book of German author Johann Wolfgang von Goethe. His style that pursuing the joy and sorrow of young people was epochal at the time when there was a lot of French aristocratic literature.It published in 1774.It was based on his experienceï¼Ž Category:German literature Category:1770s books
title: The Sorrows of Young Werther
